Generation VIII.Sword: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.
Generation VIII.Shield: If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won't be able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this Pokémon is surprisingly strong.

Generation VIII.Sword: Routes 1 and 4 , Motostoke Riverbank Bridge Field , East Lake Axewell , Motostoke Riverbank , Rolling Fields , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Routes 1 and 4 , Motostoke Riverbank Bridge Field , East Lake Axewell , Motostoke Riverbank , Rolling Fields , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Slippery Slope , Frostpoint Field , Giant's Bed , Snowslide Slope , Three-Point Pass Slippery Slope , Giant's Bed , Giant's Foot , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )
